name: Dr. John Smith
description: One thing which is not shared with other medical shows is the central character who frequently switches from a protagonist to an antagonist and back again. Dr. House is deliciously complex as a brilliant doctor with insight that soars beyond any of his peers, and sadness that sees him sink lower at the same time.
